医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究调查大麻叶的抗氧化活性研究人员使用不同的溶剂和混合物探索了大麻叶中活性化合物的抗氧化潜力和提取效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Study-investigates-the-antibiotic-activity-of-hemp-leaves.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Study-investigates-the-antibiotic-activity-of-hemp-leaves.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7fe0293-5a0a-4f1b-a0b5-eb84823f4ae5 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 07:43:00 -0400 Study investigates the antioxidant activity of hemp leaves
帝国分拆公司 NK:IO 获得英国创新癌症新疗法 160 万英镑拨款，用于开发开创性的 NK 细胞疗法NK:IO 是 NK 细胞生物学领域的领导者，致力于开发针对实体瘤的极其有效的现成细胞疗法，该公司今天宣布，该公司已获得创新英国新癌症治疗计划 160 万英镑的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Imperial-spinout-NKIO-awarded-c2a316M-Innovate-UK-New-Cancer-Therapeutics-grant-for-development-of-pioneering-NK-cell-治疗.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Imperial-spinout-NKIO-awarded-c2a316M-Innovate-UK-New-Cancer-Therapeutics-grant-for-development-of-pioneering-NK-cell- therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45a92d6c-b7c9-4215-b108-7d39356fa74f Tue, 11 Jul 2023 07:31:00 -0400 Imperial spinout NK:IO awarded £1.6M Innovate UK New Cancer Therapeutics grant for development of pioneering NK cell therapy
代际差异主要在于情感投入，而不是对人为气候变化的信念研究人员研究了英国人口在气候变化和气候参与的风险认知、情绪和信念方面的代际差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Generational-differences-are-mainly-in-emotional-engagement-rather-than-in-beliefs-about-anthropogenic-climate-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Generational-differences-are-mainly-in-emotional-engagement-rather-than-in-beliefs-about-anthropogenic-climate-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=124cb15e-cd03-4683-92d0-30ee2e0cd87e Tue, 11 Jul 2023 07:07:00 -0400 Generational differences are mainly in emotional engagement rather than in beliefs about anthropogenic climate change
用于提取健康社会决定因素的自然语言处理有关影响健康结果的非医学因素（称为健康的社会决定因素）的信息通常是在医疗预约时收集的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Natural-language-processing-used-to-extract-social-determinants-of-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Natural-language-processing-used-to-extract-social-determinants-of-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f00c4e0-f031-4f6a-9bcf-2dfc1f9f63bb Tue, 11 Jul 2023 06:37:39 -0400 Natural language processing used to extract social determinants of health
心理健康暂托设施正在填补十多个州的护理缺口如果您或您认识的人可能正在经历心理健康危机，请拨打“988”联系 988 自杀和危机生命热线，或发送短信“HOME”至 741741 联系危机短信热线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Mental-health-respite-facilities-are-filling-care-gaps-in-over-a-dozen-states.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Mental-health-respite-facilities-are-filling-care-gaps-in-over-a-dozen-states.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81d8e936-5645-4aa1-a6ef-1730632e7088 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 06:31:20 -0400 Mental health respite facilities are filling care gaps in over a dozen states
随着非营利性医院获得巨额税收减免，各州审查其所需的慈善支出2018年，当地新购买的医院转变为免税非营利实体，当地的公立学校系统不得不陷入困境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/As-nonprofit-hospitals-reap-big-tax-breaks-states-scrutinize-their-required-charity-spending.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/As-nonprofit-hospitals-reap-big-tax-breaks-states-scrutinize-their-required-charity-spending.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7c187ba-2037-4d65-bea1-bfff31fb98e0 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 06:30:02 -0400 As nonprofit hospitals reap big tax breaks, states scrutinize their required charity spending
肌肉舒缓心灵：运动训练可以降低与压力相关的血压反应研究人员进行了荟萃分析，以阐明运动训练对压力相关血压反应性的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Muscle-soothes-mind-Exercise-training-can-lower-stress-lated-blood-Pressure-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Muscle-soothes-mind-Exercise-training-can-lower-stress-lated-blood-Pressure-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad07f9ff-9f79-40c9-8b1c-34dd3e51ef6e Tue, 11 Jul 2023 06:21:00 -0400 Muscle soothes mind: Exercise training can lower stress-related blood pressure responses
桉树油对两种主要口腔疾病病原体的抗菌特性研究人员再次测试了桉树油对两种导致龋齿的细菌的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/The-antibacterial-properties-of-eucalyptus-oil-against-two-main-oral-disease-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/The-antibacterial-properties-of-eucalyptus-oil-against-two-main-oral-disease-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=049bfc49-f8cb-4162-a89a-535176ccaa15 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 06:03:00 -0400 The antibacterial properties of eucalyptus oil against two main oral disease pathogens
对于有严重 COVID-19 风险的人群，中和 SARS-CoV-2 单克隆抗体暴露前预防是否具有成本效益？最近的一项研究评估了单克隆抗体作为 COVID-19 暴露前预防 (PrEP) 的成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Could-neutralizing-SARS-CoV-2-monoclonal-antibodies-pre-exposure-prophylaxis-be-cost-efficient-in-a-population-at-严重 COVID-19 风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Could-neutralizing-SARS-CoV-2-monoclonal-antibodies-pre-exposure-prophylaxis-be-cost-efficient-in-a-population-at-严重 COVID-19 风险.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6545965c-270c-494c-a630-31e22234b87f Tue, 11 Jul 2023 05:16:00 -0400 Could neutralizing SARS-CoV-2 monoclonal antibodies pre-exposure prophylaxis be cost-effective in a population at risk for severe COVID-19?
基于 mAb 的 bELISA 开发用于检测多种动物物种中的 SARS-CoV-2 抗体研究人员开发了一种基于 mAb 的阻断酶联免疫吸附测定 (bELISA) 来检测动物中的 SARS-CoV-2。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/mAb-based-bELISA-development-to-detect-SARS-CoV-2-antibodies-in-a-broad-spectrum-of-animal-species。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/mAb-based-bELISA-development-to-detect-SARS-CoV-2-antibodies-in-a-broad-spectrum-of-animal-species。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3c7312a-3450-48da-a6b6-97b7191a1aa5 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 04:50:00 -0400 mAb-based bELISA developed to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in a broad spectrum of animal species
